name: 凯利·坎特利-卡西玛
name_full: 凯利·坎特利-卡西玛 Kelly Cantley-Kashima
introduction: Kelly Cantley-Kashima studied theatre at Boston University and worked for a few years as a theatrical stage manager before attending the Los Angeles DGA Training program. After graduating she worked as 2nd AD in Los Angeles and in all 4 of the 4 corners desert states during the heat of summer. Since then Kelly has worked as a first AD on numerous television series, pilots and features (and the occasional commercial) in Los Angeles, on location throughout the US, and internationally in Canada, Morocco and Paris.
